name: shingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
covered in small, round stones: It was uncomfortable walking barefoot on the shingly beach. See
shingle
More examplesFewer examplesThe town's beaches are small, shingly and crowded.This gull breeds on rocky, sandy and shingly coasts.Most of the region's coastal villages have a tiny, shingly strip of beach.The beach was a little shingly.
